title: How to Make a Vegan Cheesy Sausage Bake

steps.headline: Cook the pasta to al dente and drain completely.
Make the cheese sauce.
steps.description: Combine the margarine and flour in a medium saucepan. Use a whisk to stir them constantly over medium heat to avoid burning. Continue whisking while pouring in the milk. Bring the contents to a boil and remove from the heat.

steps.headline: Add the Worcestershire sauce, salt, and cheese.
steps.description: Whisk everything together until the cheese has melted.

steps.headline: Carefully add the soy sausage and pasta to the saucepan.
steps.description: Try to incorporate everything well together for thorough consistency.

steps.headline: Spread the mixture evenly in a greased 9"x13" pan.
Top the mixture with a light layer of bread crumbs.
steps.description: If you add a lot, the final dish will taste grainy.

text: Preheat your oven to 350°F/180°C.  Cook the pasta to al dente and drain completely.  Make the cheese sauce. Combine the margarine and flour in a medium saucepan. Use a whisk to stir them constantly over medium heat to avoid burning. Continue whisking while pouring in the milk. Bring the contents to a boil and remove from the heat. Add the Worcestershire sauce, salt, and cheese. Whisk everything together until the cheese has melted. Carefully add the soy sausage and pasta to the saucepan. Try to incorporate everything well together for thorough consistency. Spread the mixture evenly in a greased 9"x13" pan.  Top the mixture with a light layer of bread crumbs. If you add a lot, the final dish will taste grainy. Bake for 30 to 45 minutes.  Finished.
